author: bimargulies
msg: Some remodularization of Aegis, with the goal of supporting Jervis and JSR-131 and override types for more purposes, like Javascript. Reduce the Context object to being more of a stub, in favor of more state in the databinding object. Goal: eliminate the context object, as it is an XFire artifact.

author: sisbell
msg: Fixed bugs in resolving of dependent artifacts.
